required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Anti-Platelet Drugs and Brain-derived Neurotrophic Factor (BDNF) in Human Serum and Plasma
clinical_study.official_title: The Impact of Aspirin and Clopidogrel on Brain-derived Neurotrophic Factor (BDNF) Concentrations in Human Serum and Plasma

brief_summary.textblock: The impact of anti-platelet drugs on the concentrations of Brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) in human plasma and serum is unknown. It is the aim of this study to investigate the impact of a single dose of Aspirin (500 mg) or Clopdigrel (600 mg) on the concentrations of Brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) in plasma and serum of healthy volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: BDNF plasma and serum concentration 24 hours after Aspirin or Clopidgrel intake

secondary_outcome.measure: 5-HT and TGF-beta concentrations 24 hours after Aspirin or Clopidgrel intake

arm_group.description: Intake of 500 mg Aspirin on day 1. Intake of 600 mg Clopidogrel on day 28. Measurement of platelet inhibition, platelet counts and BDNF, TGF-beta, 5-HT concentrations in peripheral blood on day 1 (before intake of 500 mg Aspirin), day 2 (24 hours after intake of 500 mg Aspirin), day 28 (before intake of 600 mg Clopidogrel), day 29 (24 hours after intake of 600 mg Clopidogrel).

intervention.description: Intake of 500 mg Aspirin on day 1. Intake of 600 mg Clopidogrel on day 28. Blood collection for the measurement of platelet inhibition, platelet counts and BDNF, TGF-beta, 5-HT concentrations in peripheral blood on day 1 (before intake of 500 mg Aspirin), day 2 (24 hours after intake of 500 mg Aspirin), day 28 (before intake of 600 mg Clopidogrel), day 29 (24 hours after intake of 600 mg Clopidogrel).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 18-50 years
- Gender: Male
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any acute disease
- Any chronic disease
- Any medication
- Allergies / Intolerance in association with Aspirin or Clopidogrel

facility.name: Dep. of Pneumology, University of Rostock

link.description: Website of the Medical faculty of the University of Rostock

reference.citation: Lommatzsch M, Zingler D, Schuhbaeck K, Schloetcke K, Zingler C, Schuff-Werner P, Virchow JC. The impact of age, weight and gender on BDNF levels in human platelets and plasma. Neurobiol Aging. 2005 Jan;26(1):115-23.
